sentences.sContent: She swore me not to tell anybody about my secret.
sentences.sContent_eng: She swore me not to tell anybody about my secret.
sentences.sCn: 她向我发誓不把我的秘密告诉任何人。

sentences.sContent: I think we should be open to negotiate with anybody.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think we should be open to negotiate with anybody.
sentences.sCn: 他说：“我认为，我们应该同任何人进行谈判。

sentences.sContent: If using window is not appropriate than can anybody help me with dialog?
sentences.sContent_eng: If using window is not appropriate than can anybody help me with dialog?
sentences.sCn: 如果使用窗口不适当的比任何人可以帮助我与对话？

phrases.pCn: 要是有这样的人，如果有(符合这种要求的)人，倘若(或假如)有谁的话
